item.description:
And for my first event after a few months away from meet up we're headed back to The Melting Pot in Framingham for a Spanish Wine Dinner This event will run about $60 a person plus tip so please come prepared - cash is preferred.

Because this is a popular event and the restaurant is asking for reservations I will ask that you change your RSVP to a NO if you can not attend so that someone who would like to join us can take your place.

If there are any questions regarding the location of this restaurant please feel free to ask or check out the website for more information.


Thank you and see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the short Asian chick watching the door like a hawk :)
item.name: Melting Pot Wine Dinner in Framingham
